Hi Stella,

Sure, we have updated the page. Let me know if this works for you?  
https://duracube.com.au/send-us-your-plans/

Hello Joel,

Thanks for this. Following changes please,

1. Please just make the button say 'FREE QUOTE' - no exclamation mark, no SEND US YOUR PLANS
2. On the https://duracube.com.au/send-us-your-plans/ page, it should say in the top header 'Need a price? Send us your plans.' (please make sure it says 'your' not 'you' like it currently does)
3. Above the form fields, please add the text:
'We would love to assist you with your upcoming project. Either sales@duracube.com.au or leave us some details here, including your project plans, and we'll be back to you with a quote within 72 hours.'
4. On the form, please make all fields mandatory, except the plans upload
5. On the form please change fields to be -
First Name
Last Name
Company
Email
Phone
City
State
Project Details
Upload your plans

6. Within the Project Details box at the end, could we have similar to the below snip, greyed out in the box is this text below?
'Please give us any project details possible. I.e. when you need our products, colours, type of partition system required, supply only or product fully installed.

7. Down the bottom, instead of just SUBMIT, please say 'SUBMIT FOR FREE QUOTE'

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Did you know, our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate is not only antibacterial and antifungal, it's also now antiviral? Find out exactly how.

Hello Heath,

Could you please take the bar off and try the free quote button like explained below? It's something that will stay, not like an announcement that we make in the bar.

It'll also link to a Web form that is submitted to sales@duracube.com.au. Fields for the form below,

Name
Email
Company
Phone
City

Upload your plans (upload function for plans)

Thanks

Kind regards,

Stella Simpson
Duracube Marketing Coordinator
P. 0428 685 691

full_threads.body:
Hi Stella, 

We have added a bar across the top of the entire sire. Please have a look and let me know if this is what you had in mind? 

Also, it's linked to the contact page... Is that correct, or did you want it linked somewhere else?
@heath Can we talk about this?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

We're wanting to get a very easy, bold FREE QUOTE or SEND US YOUR PLANS or something similar on the homepage, and hopefully every page of our website. But first, needing your advice please.

1. do you know if the search function is actually being used on our website? and does it help SEO at all by having it there?

... reason being, if it's hardly being used, we could maybe get rid of the search function and change the CALL US: to just be the phone symbol and our number. Like:
📞 1300 387 228
(this is not a good example of a phone icon!)

Then beside/under the phone number, we could replace the sales@duracube.com.au email with a button maybe saying
FREE QUOTE or
SEND US YOUR PLANS

I just don't want to clog up that top header of the website too much, which probably will happen if we add a button to the header as it is now, with search function and all.

Unless you have a better suggestion for how to quickly tell customers how to request a quote/where to send their plans to. I wondered about a pop up once they'd been online for 30 seconds or so but i think that'd get annoying. Also would like it to be mobile friendly too if possible.

We get a lot of phone calls each day just asking where to send their plans, hence wanting to do this :)

Thanks, very glad of your ideas. Feel free to call me if it's easier - 0428 685 691.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
